name: Experimental Treatment
description:
Scenario :

In “Experimental Treatment”, you will be able to live as a voluntary medical guinea pig, testing out new pills and trying to cure your own diseases. However, the pills you will try might have unexpected results, and you have to make sure that your organs do not stop working.

Description :

- Select pills from the 3 available by selecting the "take pill" button

- Repeat to heal your body and earn money

- When one of your organs is affected you must select a good pill or make an implant (be careful, at first you do not know the effects of the pills)

- If you can't save your organ, you lose.

Staff - La communauté de la plancha :

How to play :

  • Use left click for selection

Game created with  101 commit using Collab
